alert.note: Alert for Hardin; McNairy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 02 at 4:26PM CDT until May 02 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern McNairy County in west Tennessee... Western Hardin County in west Tennessee... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 426 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Shiloh, or 8 miles north of Corinth, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Savannah, Adamsville, Morris Chapel, Shiloh, Crump, Eastview, Michie, Guys, Ramer, Stantonville, Milledgeville, Good Hope, Pebble Hill, Right, Phillips, Tulu, Old Lawton, Acton, Hurley and Walkertown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
